participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and determined, Emily is passionate about animal conservation and environmental issues.
participant_1.background: My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn more about animals and the environment. I have not been in a fight, but I've seen my sister in one. I'm worried about keeping my bar afloat, but I'm also determined to make it work. My dad works offshore. I'm not very concerned about my appearance, as long as I look presentable.

participant_2.name: Leo
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and creative, Leo is deeply committed to environmental advocacy and enjoys expressing himself through film.
participant_2.background: My appearance is not my main concern, since I care more about the environment and fighting for its protection. I watch a movie on Sunday evenings. I'm of mixed race, but I identify more with my Chinese heritage. I have trouble getting motivated. My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.

content.text: What are your hobbies?
I like to watch movies and fight for the environment.
That sounds interesting! What kind of movies do you like?
I like movies about animals and the environment.
Do you like to learn about animals?
Yes, I think it's important to know about the environment and the animals that live in it.
I think so too! I love to learn about animals and the environment.
That's great! What's your favorite animal?
I think my favorite animal is the tiger.
Tigers are really cool! I like how they're so strong and independent.
Me too! I think they're beautiful animals.
I agree! What do you like to do to help the environment?
I try to recycle and compost as much as possible.
That's great! I try to do the same thing.
I also try to buy products that are environmentally friendly.
That's a great idea! I should try to do that more.
I think it's important to do what we can to help the environment.
I agree! We all have to do our part.
Yes, we do! I think it's important to be educated about the environment and to get involved in protecting it.
I agree! I think it's important to make a difference in the world.
